page.title: 14::::: HOME LIFE ::::::
page.content:
Two houses compared. Adam WALDEN (age 7) 4 bedroomed detatched house. Hall, downstairs toilet, wash basin. lounge 7mx3m, dining room. KITCHEN>> Refridgerator,deep freeze, electric cooker, micro wave oven, dishwasher, washing machine tumble dryer, toast maker sandwhich maker television. Bathroom separate toilet upstairs, shower and toilet in master bedroom large airing cupboard to dry clothes. Large 2 car garage and utility room.
Claire WHITEHURST (age 10) 3 Bedroomed semi detatched house. Hall, Lounge 5m x 3m dining room. Kitchen, cooker refridgerator, micro wave toaster, washing machine, tumble dryer toaster. Bathroom and toilet. Garage with deep freeze in. Both houses: small gardens.
